original_text:
like a robe you will roll them up,
    like a garment they will be changed.
But you are the same,
    and your years will have no end.”
korean_text: 의복처럼 갈아입을 것이요 그것들은 옷과 같이 변할 것이나 주는 여전하여 연대가 다함이 없으리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: like a robe you will roll them up
like a garment they will be changed.
and your years will have no end.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 해는 끝이 없을 것이다
